quest.name: The Legacy of Our Fathers
journal: Alphinaud is a man with one less worry on his mind.

dialogue.name: THANCRED
dialogue.text: Saved once more by Urianger's ingenuity. I look forward to learning why it was so imperative that we remain ignorant of the device's precise function.

dialogue.name: KRILE
dialogue.text: They used medicines to keep me in a torpor for much of the time. I...fear I am still recovering from their effects. But I will be fine. I will.

dialogue.name: MNAAGO
dialogue.text: Can you believe it? Not only did we secure the residential district, but we captured Fordola! Wait till the Flame General hears about this!

dialogue.name: WISCAR
dialogue.text: <pant> <pant> Looks like it wasn't my day to die. I owe you one, Meffrid...

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: Lyse has gone to deliver Fordola into the custody of the Alliance, leaving M'naago and her men to hold the residential district and stand ready.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: Once the Alliance has breached the main gates and commenced their assault, the Resistance forces will push through the entrance here and join the fray.

dialogue.name: THANCRED
dialogue.text: In that case, I will remain here. My search for Krile took me into the city proper, and my familiarity with their defenses may prove useful to the Resistance.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: Understood. I shall instruct Arenvald and his unit to render support as well.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: They were tasked with securing the aetheryte, as I recall. With me, Forename.

dialogue.name: THANCRED
dialogue.text: Brave though they may be, these freedom fighters will need every advantage if they are to defeat their oppressors. I will do what I can to tip the odds in their favor.

dialogue.name: KRILE
dialogue.text: I didn't know what had become of Arenvald and the others after I was taken. It's such a relief to see them hale and healthy.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: This aetheryte is perhaps the most strategically important landmark here, as it can serve as a gateway for attuned troops with sufficient anima. Such tactics are not without their risks, however...

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: Were the imperials to discover that the aetheryte was being used in such a fashion, they might turn their artillery upon us─destroying the beacon and the better part of the district, at the cost of countless civilian lives...

dialogue.name: MNAAGO
dialogue.text: You can count on us, Forename!

dialogue.name: WISCAR
dialogue.text: Don't you worry─I'm under no illusions. I was lucky to survive back there. I'll have to work harder and train longer if I'm going to stay alive.

dialogue.name: ARENVALD
dialogue.text: Gods, Krile... It's so good to see you. I feared the worst...

dialogue.name: KRILE
dialogue.text: It wasn't your fault. You saved me─all of you. Thank you.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: We will be departing shortly for Porta Praetoria to rejoin the main host.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: Arenvald, I would have your unit remain here with Thancred, that you might support the Resistance troops in the coming battle.

dialogue.name: ARENVALD
dialogue.text: Understood! We won't let you down.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: ...I trust you will refrain from doing anything I would not. We are both far too young to die.

dialogue.name: ARENVALD
dialogue.text: Right, right─no noble sacrifices! Got it!

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: Forename, Krile─let us be off, then.

dialogue.name: ARENVALD
dialogue.text: Thank the Twelve she's all right. I don't know what I would have done...

dialogue.name: STORMOFFICER
dialogue.text: Well done securing the residential district! Ala Mhigo is nearly ours!

dialogue.name: SERPENTOFFICER
dialogue.text: The Matron smiles upon us this day with the safe return of you and your captured comrade. Such tidings are sure to raise the men's spirits.

dialogue.name: VMAHTIA
dialogue.text: Krile is safe, and the Ala Mhigan Quarter secure. We could not have hoped for a better outcome.

dialogue.name: JMOLDVA
dialogue.text: It is far, far too early to celebrate. Zenos is not finished with us yet.

dialogue.name: URIANGER
dialogue.text: I prithee proceed with the utmost caution, Forename. If there be truth in Fordola's words, and the viceroy is indeed possessed of a power “echoing that of the eikons,” then still greater strength shall be required to bring about his defeat.

dialogue.name: RAUBAHN
dialogue.text: As I said, there is but one path forward. We take Ala Mhigo, and with it, Zenos's head.

dialogue.name: STORMOFFICER
dialogue.text: Heh heh, I can't wait to see Marshal Slafyrsyn in action! His Maelstrike is the stuff of legends!

dialogue.name: SERPENTOFFICER
dialogue.text: I must admit, my Lominsan counterpart's enthusiasm is...infectious. I find that I too am eager to see this so-called “Maelstrike” firsthand.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: If I may, General─is there aught Forename and I can do to assist with final preparations?

dialogue.name: RAUBAHN
dialogue.text: I'm glad you asked. Pipin informed me moments ago that all forces are in position and that we are ready to commence the assault.

dialogue.name: RAUBAHN
dialogue.text: Naught remains but to notify the Alliance commanders. If you've no objections, I should be glad to have you do the honors, Forename[GC Rank].

dialogue.name: RAUBAHN
dialogue.text: You were instrumental to the success of Operation Archon. You helped bring an end to the Dragonsong War. You are a hero to the people and a symbol of hope.

dialogue.name: RAUBAHN
dialogue.text: Some might judge it an empty gesture, or worse a waste of your talents, but I know it would mean much to everyone here.

dialogue.name: RAUBAHN
dialogue.text: 'Tis one thing to hear the tales, another to look upon the woman herselfman himself. Now is the time to remind our comrades that they are not alone.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: The General makes a good point. The Warrior of Light's worth may be measured not only by what shehe does, but by what shehe inspires others to do.

dialogue.name: KANESENNA
dialogue.text: All is ready? Very well. Though many will fall in the coming battle, how many more shall know liberty for their sacrifice.

dialogue.name: KANESENNA
dialogue.text: There is a time for peace, and a time for war. Even the Matron understands this. We who have received of Hers and the elementals' blessings go now to stand for Eorzea and her children.

dialogue.name: BODYGUARD01623
dialogue.text: The Elder Seedseer saw fit to grant me mercy at Carteneau. Perhaps, if the opportunity allows, we may offer the same to my former comrades...but if not, then so be it.

dialogue.name: KANESENNA
dialogue.text: Matron forgive us for what we must do.

dialogue.name: MERLWYB
dialogue.text: It's time, then. Though this is not my theater of choice, we will play our part. Our cannons care not either way.

dialogue.name: MERLWYB
dialogue.text: That battery has sunk enough ships to fill a fleet. 'Tis not like to be bested by a gate.

dialogue.name: EYNZAHRSLAFYRSYN
dialogue.text: 'Tis rare these days that I am granted leave to take the field. Mayhap I should have brought my mask...

dialogue.name: MERLWYB
dialogue.text: They are fine gates, no doubt. And they will make fine slag.

dialogue.name: AYMERIC
dialogue.text: Hah! That you should be the one to bring me word. By the Fury, it is good to see you, my friend.

dialogue.name: AYMERIC
dialogue.text: You, who stood with us in our direst hour, will ever be an inspiration to my countrymen─and to me. Though Ishgard's debt can never be repaid, it is my hope that our deeds this day shall go some small way to redressing the balance.

dialogue.name: LUCIA
dialogue.text: Zenos has never cared a whit for politics. He lives for war and war alone. Kill him, or he will kill you.

dialogue.name: AYMERIC
dialogue.text: Several times you defended our gates. Let us return the favor by demolishing theirs.

dialogue.name: RAUBAHN
dialogue.text: It is done, then? Thank you, Forename[GC Rank]...for humoring an old bull.

dialogue.name: STORMOFFICER
dialogue.text: Maelstrom, Adder, and Ishgardian forces are in position, General!

dialogue.name: SERPENTOFFICER
dialogue.text: Resistance forces in the Ala Mhigan Quarter are ready and await our signal.

dialogue.name: RAUBAHN
dialogue.text: Naught left to do but the deed itself.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: I have asked Urianger to look after Krile. He will keep her out of harm's way. Though, after what she has endured, her physical well-being may be the least of our worries...

dialogue.name: URIANGER
dialogue.text: Worry not for her safety. Look thee to the east.

dialogue.name: STORMOFFICER
dialogue.text: Hah hah! Till sea swallows all!

dialogue.name: SERPENTOFFICER
dialogue.text:
We have done all we can to prepare.
For serenity, purity, sanctity.
For serenity, purity, sanctity...

obj.n: At the Top of the Stairs
